name: Bomber-Kick
description:
Made for CS 425 (Game Programming 1)

Play as a young boy traversing the danger of the maze-like forest. He brought a small bag of explosives along to blow up any obstacles along the way. Enter the forest, defeat enemies, and grow more powerful along the way!

Bomber-kick was made from a game engine created from our team. Meaning, the entire game was made from scratch!

We took a turn on the popular game Bomber-man, by letting it meet the mystery dungeon genre. 

Controls: WASD to move, space to drop a bomb, e to kick the bomb.
